_scripts.dist: pnpm run git-update && npm run update-meta && node ./.dev/dist.js
_scripts.svn:add: cd svn && svn add trunk/* && svn add assets/*
_scripts.svn:release-trunk: cd svn && svn ci -m "Pushing new trunk release" --username 48design
_scripts.svn:release-tags: cd svn && svn add tags/* && svn ci -m "Updating tags" --username 48design
_scripts.git-clone: git clone https://github.com/48design/wp-licensing-and-update-module.git premium/vad-updater && cd premium/vad-updater && pnpm install
_scripts.git-update: git -C "premium/vad-updater" --git-dir "./.git" pull && cd premium/vad-updater && pnpm install
_scripts.postinstall: pnpm run git-update || pnpm run git-clone
